summary.span: 表示托管代码的符号编写器。

span.span: Represents a symbol writer for managed code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了定义的文档、 序列点、 词法作用域和变量的方法。The class provides methods that define documents, sequence points, lexical scopes, and variables.

param.span: 如果为零，则忽略此参数，并在整个范围内定义变量。

span.span: If zero, this parameter is ignored and the variable is defined throughout the entire scope.

param.span: 如果不为零，则它处于当前范围的偏移量内。

span.span: If nonzero, it falls within the offsets of the current scope.

span.span: The end offset for the variable.

param.span: 如果为零，则忽略此参数，并在整个范围内定义变量。

span.span: If zero, this parameter is ignored and the variable is defined throughout the entire scope.

param.span: 如果不为零，则它处于当前范围的偏移量内。

span.span: If nonzero, it falls within the offsets of the current scope.

summary.span: 在当前词法范围内定义单个变量。

span.span: Defines a single variable in the current lexical scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `startOffset`和`endOffset`参数是可选的。The `startOffset` and `endOffset` parameters are optional. 如果其值为零，它们将被忽略，并在整个范围内定义的变量。If their value is zero, they are ignored and the variable is defined throughout the entire scope. 如果其值为非零值，它们属于当前范围的偏移量。If their value is nonzero, they fall within the offsets of the current scope. 您可以调用多次针对不同的偏移量范围，在整个范围中出现多次的同一名称的变量。You can call multiple times for a variable of the same name that occurs multiple times in different offset ranges throughout a scope. （在这种情况下，开始和结束偏移量不能重叠。）(In this case, start and end offsets must not overlap.)

abstract member DefineSequencePoints : System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocumentWriter * int[] * int[] * int[] * int[] * int[] -> unit override this.DefineSequencePoints : System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocumentWriter * int[] * int[] * int[] * int[] * int[] -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: symWriter.DefineSequencePoints (document, offsets, lines, columns, endLines, endColumns)

param.name: document
param.span: 正在为其定义序列点的文档对象。

span.span: The document object for which the sequence points are being defined.

param.name: offsets
param.span: 从该方法的开头测量的序列点的 IL 偏移量。

span.span: The IL offset of the sequence points measured from the beginning of the method.
The starting line numbers of the sequence points.
The starting column numbers of the sequence points.
The ending line numbers of the sequence points.
The ending column numbers of the sequence points.

summary.span: 在当前方法内定义一组序列点。

span.span: Defines a group of sequence points within the current method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列点用于源文件位置和 IL 偏移量之间进行映射。Sequence points are used to map between source file locations and IL offsets. 每个序列点包含的 IL 偏移量和源代码文件区域，指定的开始和结束行/列的编号，相对于对象。Each sequence point consists of an IL offset and source file region, specified by start and end line/column numbers relative to an object. 每个数组的某个特定索引处的每个元素对应于特定序列点。Each element at a specific index of every array corresponds to a specific sequence point. 每个行和每个列定义一种方法中的语句的开始。Each line and each column defines the start of a statement within a method. 数组应偏移量的不断增加的顺序进行排序。The arrays should be sorted in the increasing order of offsets. 偏移量始终是方法的从开头，以字节为单位的偏移量。The offset is always the offset from the start of the method, in bytes.

span.span: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写。This method overrides . 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的`Finalize`方法将自动调用垃圾回收期间除非终止由垃圾回收器已禁用通过调用方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此外设置输出文件的名称写入调试符号的位置。 also sets the output file name where the debugging symbols are written. 此方法可以调用仅一次，并且编写器的任何其他方法在调用之前必须调用。This method can be called only once and must be called before any other writer methods are called.

param.name: method
param.span: 要打开的方法的元数据标记。

span.span: The metadata token for the method to be opened.

summary.span: 打开一个在其中放置符号信息的方法。

span.span: Opens a method in which to place symbol information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的方法将成为当前方法的调用，以定义序列点、 参数和词法范围。The specified method becomes the current method for calls to define sequence points, parameters, and lexical scopes. 没有围绕整个方法的隐式词法作用域。There is an implicit lexical scope around the entire method. 重新打开已关闭的方法会清除任何以前定义的符号的方法。Reopening a method that has been previously closed erases any previously defined symbols for the method.

span.span: Opens a new namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义方法或命名空间中存在的变量之前调用此方法。Call this method before defining methods or variables that exist within a namespace. 可以嵌套命名空间。Namespaces can be nested.

param.name: startOffset
param.span: 从方法的开始到词法范围中第一个指令的 IL 偏移量，以字节数表示。

span.span: The IL offset in bytes from the beginning of the method to the first instruction in the lexical scope.

summary.span: 在当前方法中打开新的词法范围。

span.span: Opens a new lexical scope in the current method.

returns.span: 一个不透明的范围标识符，它以后可以与 一起使用，以定义范围的起始和结束偏移量。

span.span: An opaque scope identifier that can be used with to define the start and end offsets of a scope at a later time.

returns.span: 在这种情况下，忽略传递到 和 的偏移量。

span.span: In this case, the offsets passed to and are ignored.

returns.span: 范围标识符只在当前方法中有效。

span.span: A scope identifier is valid only in the current method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此范围将成为新的当前作用域，并推送到的作用域堆栈上。This scope becomes the new current scope and is pushed onto a stack of scopes. 作用域必须形成层次结构。Scopes must form a hierarchy. 同级不能重叠。Siblings are not allowed to overlap. 范围标识符只是在当前方法中有效。Scope identifiers are only valid in the current method.

span.span: An type pointer to code that is the underlying writer.

summary.span: 设置基础 [ISymUnmanagedWriter 接口](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/diagnostics/isymunmanagedwriter-interface.md)（相应的非托管 API），托管 使用它来发出符号。

span.span: Sets the underlying [ISymUnmanagedWriter Interface](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/diagnostics/isymunmanagedwriter-interface.md) (the corresponding unmanaged API) that a managed uses to emit symbols.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基础[ISymUnmanagedWriter 接口](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/diagnostics/isymunmanagedwriter-interface.md)（对应的非托管 API） 接口表示托管代码的符号编写器。The underlying [ISymUnmanagedWriter Interface](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/diagnostics/isymunmanagedwriter-interface.md) (the corresponding unmanaged API) interface represents a symbol writer for managed code. 该接口提供方法用于定义文档、 序列点、 词法作用域和变量。The interface provides methods to define documents, sequence points, lexical scopes, and variables.

permission.span: 用于访问非托管的代码的功能。

span.span: for the ability to access unmanaged code.

param.span: 命名空间的完全限定名称。

span.span: The fully qualified name of the namespace.

summary.span: 指定在打开的词法范围内使用给定的、完全限定的命名空间名称。

span.span: Specifies that the given, fully qualified namespace name is used within the open lexical scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭当前作用域可防止此作用域使用的命名空间。Closing the current scope prevents this scope from using the namespace. 命名空间将保留在当前打开的范围从继承的所有作用域中使用。The namespace remains in use in all scopes that inherit from the current open scope.
